plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

STATEMENT OF AUTHORITY. (§ 6-2001)

The procedure of improving any street or sidewalk financed by special
assessments shall follow that prescribed in Article 10 of Chapter 160A of the
General Statutes as amended and all applicable local acts enacted by the General
Assembly. Street and sidewalk improvements may be initiated by the City Council
or by a statutory petition of property owners.
